name: Constitution Town: Innovative eLearning Videogame! Phase 1
blurb: Constitution Town is a revolutionary, educational and interactive videogame being designed to teach students about American government.

rewards.reward: No Reward
BACKER: You have the right to bear your arms...and wrap them around our resident Founding Father, Jefferson Quincy Washington III, Esq.  PLUS, get your picture taken if you meet him!
MINUTEMAN: Constitution book signed by our Constitution Town team! Includes an end-of-year tax-deduction!
FEDERALIST: Access to exclusive social media avatars, profile pictures, timeline pictures, etc. Includes an end-of-year tax deduction!
REVOLUTIONARY: Exclusive audio download of game soundtrack, plus social media images.  Includes an end-of-year tax deduction!
PATRIOT: Liberty Day Kids t-shirt!  Includes an end-of-year tax deduction!

DELEGATE: Liberty Day Constitution Kit: includes t-shirt, 5 Constitution booklets w/ Q&A flashcards, 5 flag pins, a small game print of "The Founders," and a copy of the U.S. Government's "Our Flag" booklet.  Includes an end-of-year tax deduction!
CONGRESSMAN: Get a special-edition, free copy of the final Constitution Town for the device of your choice!  Includes an end-of-year tax deduction!

SENATOR: Receive the exclusive, limited-edition Constitution Town e-book.  Includes concept and visual art, game plans and backstory, exclusive images, modeling artwork, etc.  Also get a free copy of Constitution Town.  Includes an end-of-year tax deduction!
SIGNER: Receive an exclusive, limited edition, 8.5" x 11" framed copy of "The Founders" poster.  Includes an end-of-year tax deduction!

SECRETARY: Exclusive conference call with our development team, followed by a special test drive of Constitution Town.  You will also receive your name in the game credits and included on our "Game Founders" webpage.  Includes an end-of-year tax deduction!

FREE MASON: Receive an exclusive, limited edition, 36" x 24" framed copy of "The Founders" poster - an exciting, one-of-a-kind collector's item!  Includes listing in game credits and mention on the "Game Founders" page, along with an end-of-year tax deduction!
SETTLER: Get a non-playable character named after you!  Includes listing in game credits and mention on the "Game Founders" page, along with an end-of-year tax deduction!

COLONIST: Get a non-playable character named after you that the kids may interact with. Includes listing in game credits and mention on the "Game Founders" page.  PLUS you'll get to participate in an exclusive conference call with our development team, followed by a special test drive of Constitution Town, along with an end-of-year tax deduction!

AMBASSADOR: Ever wondered what it would be like to have a statue erected in your image?  We'll do just that! Includes listing in game credits and mention on the "Game Founders" page.  PLUS you'll get to participate in an exclusive conference call with our development team, followed by a special test drive of Constitution Town, along with an end-of-year tax deduction!

ESQUIRE: Have your name immortalized on a house or doormat in the game! Includes listing in game credits and mention on the "Game Founders" page.  Participate in an exclusive conference call with our development team, followed by a special test drive of Constitution Town, along with an end-of-year tax deduction!

FOR BUSINESSES: Velocity Radio is a unique online radio opportunity.  They have agreed to offer business sponsors at this level 5 LIVE radio spots to promote your business. Includes listing in game credits and mention on the "Game Founders" page AND a web link to your business (helping with SEO). You will be eligible to participate in an exclusive conference call with our development team, followed by a special test drive of Constitution Town, along with an end-of-year tax deduction!

MERCHANT: Have your name or business name immortalized on an establishment (meaning, free advertising!)  Includes listing in game credits and mention on the "Game Founders" page AND a web link to your business (helping with SEO).  You will also receive an exclusive conference call with our development team, followed by a special test drive of Constitution Town, along with an end-of-year tax deduction!

PROPRIETOR: For the enterprising business contributor or individual, you'll not only have your name or business name immortalized on an establishment (meaning, free advertising!), but we'll also include your own non-playable character at this establishment as well!  Includes listing in game credits and mention on the "Game Founders" page AND a web link to your business (helping with SEO). You will also receive an exclusive conference call with our development team, followed by a special test drive of Constitution Town, along with an end-of-year tax deduction!

FOR BUSINESSES: Velocity Radio is a unique online radio opportunity.  They have agreed to offer business sponsors at this level 5 LIVE radio spots to promote your business, PLUS an exclusive listing on a promotional page on their website that will be specially optimized for Search Engine Optimization, helping your business show up higher on Google. Includes listing in game credits and mention on the "Game Founders" page AND a web link to your business (also helping with SEO). You will be eligible to participate in an exclusive conference call with our development team, followed by a special test drive of Constitution Town, along with an end-of-year tax deduction!

GENERAL: Provide your own character voiceover for the game!  All previous rewards included, with your choice of a statue, NPC, house, or business establishment from the previous rewards.  Includes an end-of-year 2013 tax deduction!

PRESIDENT: Help Liberty Day design a CUSTOM MINI-GAME ADVENTURE WITHIN THE GAME!  We will seek your guidance on a custom minigame playable in Constitution Town and craft it with your specifications in mind.  You will receive a standalone copy of the minigame, of course!  All previous rewards included.  Includes an end-of-year 2013 tax deduction!
